SEARCH
Package Model

Class PlayerBehaviourStrategy

java.lang.Object
Model.PlayerBehaviourStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggressivePlayer, BenevolentPlayer, CheaterPlayer, HumanPlayer, RandomPlayer
public abstract class PlayerBehaviourStrategy extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a strategy for player behavior in the game. Subclasses should implement specific behavior types (e.g., aggressive, defensive).
See Also:
